name: Hello
description: Wave your hand with your palm facing outward. This is one of the most common signs and is universally recognized.

name: I am sorry
description: Make a fist and rub it in a circular motion over your chest. This shows remorse or apology.

name: Welcome
description: With your palm facing up, move your hand from the side toward the center of your chest.

name: Goodbye
description: Wave your open hand back and forth with fingers together.

name: Mother
description: Tap your thumb on your chin. This is derived from the sign for 'female' combined with 'parent'.

name: Father
description: Tap your thumb on your forehead. This is derived from the sign for 'male' combined with 'parent'.

name: Friend
description: Hook both index fingers and link them together, then switch positions and link again.

name: I
description: Point your index finger at yourself.

name: You
description: Point your index finger at the person you're addressing.

name: He
description: Point your index finger toward where the male person is or was.

name: She
description: Point your index finger toward where the female person is or was.
Index finger up, palm facing away.
Index and middle fingers up, palm away from you .
Index, middle, and thumb up, palm away from you.
Four fingers up (excluding thumb), palm away from you.
All five fingers up, palm away from you.
All five fingers up, palm away from you and raise the index finger of your second hand.
All five fingers up, palm away from you. And raise the index and middle fingers of your second hand.
All five fingers up, palm away from you. And raise the index, middle and ring fingers of your second hand.
All five fingers up, palm away from you. And raise all the fingers of the other hand except the thumb.
Raise all fingers of both hands.

name: Monday
description: Four fingers are clenched into a fist, the thumb is inside.

name: Tuesday
description: The index finger is half bent, the other fingers are clenched into a fist.

name: Wednesday
description: Hand shows three fingers in the shape of the letter <W>.

name: Thursday
description: The index finger is half bent, the other fingers are clenched into a fist. The index and middle fingers are brought together and point to the side, all the others are bent.

name: Friday
description: The thumb holds the index finger on top. All other fingers are spread out.

name: Saturday
description: The hand is clenched into a fist, the thumb is on the outside.

name: Sunday
description: Hands clasped in supplication.
